ActInputValue.Value: select PURO_OID from (select PURO_OID from inv_purchase_ordln order by sys_creation_date desc) where rownum=1
update rmsppcxcr set MANUFACTURER_ID='00001481',MANF_LOC_ID='40000001', MANF_OID='{Var Name=PO_ID}' where JOB_REC='RMSPPCXCR'
cat {Var Name=Log_name}| grep 'The path of the PPC' | xargs echo c=
cat {Var Name=Log_name}| grep 'The name of the' | xargs echo c=

VariableString.InitialStringValue: c= The path of the PPC file is : /users/vdwrk727/var/puc/projs/rms/interfaces/output/Jul/10/
VariableString.Name: PPC_FILE_PATH

VariableString.InitialStringValue: c= The name of the PPC file is : rms.RMSPPCXCR20_reg.20230710_053057.output The name of the PPC file is : rms.RMSPPCXCR20_reg.20230710_053057.output
VariableString.Name: PPC_Fle_name

ActInputValue.Value: update ac_processing_accounting set FILE_NAME='{Var Name=Final_extract_file}', FILE_PATH='{Var Name=Final_PPC_File_path}',FILE_STATUS='RD' where identifier = '111'
select FILE_STATUS from ac_processing_accounting where identifier = '111'
update ac_processing_accounting set FILE_NAME='{Var Name=Final_Input_file_of_simulator}', FILE_PATH='{Var Name=Final_PPC_File_path}',FILE_STATUS='RD' where identifier = '564623165'
